articles.title: Era ends, uncertainty looms as US forces pull out of main Afghanistan base - GMA News Online
articles.description: American troops pulled out of their main military base in Afghanistan on Friday, leaving behind a piece of the World Trade Center they buried 20 years ago in a country that could descend into civil war without them.
